caption.p: The principal component analysis biplot of the lipid fraction extracted from B. scorzonerifolium samples collected from different regions. Numerals indicate our data ( Table 3). Violet-filled quadrants indicate samples from Buryatia (Russia), green-filled quadrants are samples from the Transâ€“Baikal region (Russia), red-filled quadrants are the samples from Khentii aimag (Mongolia).
